It can be so difficult sometimes to tell the truth. I don't mean not telling lies. I mean something else, the way that words sometime feel like they're obscuring the thoughts in your head the second you try to dictate them. When I was in design school I had this one professor who overwhelmed me. If I was crying in the bathroom, she was normally the culprit. She was always saying stuff like this to me: "Work smart, not hard!" She'd normally say this as I sat at a desk in the design lab, red-eyed and close to tears from staying up the night before. Long nights working against my growing exhaustion because I desired so‚Ä¶
